    • Uses of Status in com.att.research.xacml.api

      Methods in com.att.research.xacml.api that return Status 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Status Result.getStatus()
      Gets the Status associated with this Result.
      Status Request.getStatus()
      Gets the Status representing the XACML Status element for the Request represented by this Request.
      Status Status.merge(Status status)
      Returns a Status with the same StatusCode and status message as this Status but whose StatusDetail is the merging of the StatusDetail in this Status and the StatusDetail in the given Status.
      Methods in com.att.research.xacml.api with parameters of type Status 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Status Status.merge(Status status)
      Returns a Status with the same StatusCode and status message as this Status but whose StatusDetail is the merging of the StatusDetail in this Status and the StatusDetail in the given Status.
